title: (x) Copperplate without serifs? - various {gang}
content:
Do any of you know the name of the font that looks exactly like Copperplate without the serifs?   
   
Thanks!

 [‹ (x) Jazzanova - In between {Richard Andrews}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071108234623/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4042 "Go to previous forum topic") [319 MAIN ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071108234623/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4051 "Go to next forum topic")
author: alyce

comments.content:
Gotham from Hoefler (the caps)   
Proxima from MS studio   
Anisette, Anisette Petite from me (bit too different)   
and the one from House, can't recall the name?
